Built-in material allowing the user to test the package with demo data

Source: R/01-utils.R
DEMO_files_harmo.Rd

Built-in tibbles and lists allowing the user to test the package with demo material for harmonization.

DEMO_files_harmo

Format

list

A list with 15 elements used for testing the package (data frames and lists):

DEMO_data_processing_elements - final

Data processing element

DEMO_data_processing_elements - with error

Data processing element containing errors

DEMO_data_processing_elements - work in progress

Data processing element in construction

DEMO_dataschema

DataSchema used, combined with data processing elements and study-specific material

pooled_harmonized_dataset

pooled harmonized dataset for testing purpose

harmonized_dossier

harmonized dossier for testing purpose

summary_var_harmo

harmonized variables summary for testing purpose

dd_MELBOURNE_1_format_maelstrom

Data dictionary (1) of Melbourne dataset

dd_MELBOURNE_2_format_maelstrom

Data dictionary (2) of Melbourne dataset

dd_PARIS_format_maelstrom

Data dictionary of Paris dataset

dd_TOKYO_format_maelstrom

Data dictionary of Tokyo dataset

dataset_MELBOURNE_1

Dataset of Melbourne (1)

dataset_MELBOURNE_2

Dataset of Melbourne (2)

dataset_PARIS

Dataset of Paris

dataset_TOKYO

Dataset of Tokyo

...

Examples

{

 print(DEMO_files_harmo$`dataschema - final`)

}
